member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Cryptography.Configuration.Manageability.CryptographySettingsManageabilityProvider
member.summary: This type supports the Enterprise Library Manageability Extensions infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Represents the behavior required to provide Group Policy updates and to publish the instances associated to the configuration information for the Cryptography Application Block, and it also manages the creation of the ADM template categories and policies required to edit Group Policy Objects for the block.
member.remarks: This class performs the actual Group Policy update and Wmi object generation for the configuration section. Processing for and instances is delegated to objects registered to the configuration object data types.
